title: No UMTS/hspda/ hspda+ channel in us pixel 3xl. Does it support 3g network of Bangladesh?
content: i want to buy pixel 3xl from us store but i am stayed at bangladesh where most of cellular network still now 3g. Does us device compatible with bangladesh 3g network as us google store pixel 3 xl spec shows no umts/hspa+/hspda?
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3 XL
